name: Command Line Execution with Suspicious URL and AppData Strings
description: Detects a suspicious command line execution that includes an URL and AppData string in the command line parameters as used by several droppers (js/vbs > powershell)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.command_line:*http* AND process.command_line:*\:\/\/* AND process.command_line:*%AppData%*)`
